name: LiveSplit One Layout
summary: Learn about .LS1L files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Speedrunners and content creators are the primary users of LS1L files. They use these files to customize the look and feel of their timers for personal use or for streaming runs to platforms such as Twitch or YouTube.

After saving their layout configuration as an LS1L file, they can reload it later or share it with others. By sharing LS1L files, runners can distribute standardized layouts for events, races, or community challenges.
NOTE: To create an LS1L file with LiveSplit One, select Layout → Export.

instructions: You can open LS1L files with LiveSplit One via a web browser. To open an LS1L file with LiveSplit One, select Layout → Import and choose the LS1L file you want to upload to open.
Since LS1L files store plain text, you can open them with a text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad or Apple TextEdit.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
